title: Please dont neft Irel
body: Please Riot u have been nefted Irelia's W and it is very bad right now, and i saw something this morning about nefting irelia patch 9.2 again. Her Q her passive n her R, please riot i can only play rank with irelia if u neft her i will uninstall this game 100% no matter what {{item:3070}} {{champion:39}} {{sticker:sg-soraka}}  PLS PLS PLS PLP PLS PLS PLS PLS PLS PLS I BEGGING YOU PLS DONT NEFT HER
